sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Remove mobile native client choice types</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var choiceGR = new GlideRecord('sys_choice');
choiceGR.addQuery('name', 'sys_sg_native_client');
choiceGR.query();
while (choiceGR.next())
choiceGR.deleteRecord();

var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
gr.addQuery('name', 'sys_sg_native_client');
gr.addQuery('element','type');
gr.query();
if (gr.next()) {
gr.setValue('default_value','');
gr.update();
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-03-30 05:08:10</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>260aa2805b1320103ab5216fa881c76f</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Remove mobile native client choice types and default value</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Mobile Applet Launcher" source="com.glide.sg.applet_launcher">eb3434a83c31311068bcf327dfe37fbc</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_260aa2805b1320103ab5216fa881c76f</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-03-30 05:08:10</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Remove mobile native client choice types
